titles.title: Lifetime Consequences for Sex Offenders Act of 2003
To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide a maximum term of supervised release of life for sex offenders.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 1/27/2003--Introduced. Lifetime Consequences for Sex Offenders Act of 2003 - Amends the Federal criminal code to make any term of years or life the authorized term of supervised release for the offenses of sexual abuse, sexual exploitation of children, transportation for illegal sexual activity (generally), and sex trafficking of children.
